title: How to Feed Your Worm Farm | Smash it Down & Add Some Browns!

tasks.task: Starting and maintaining a worm farm
subtasks: Obtaining food scraps to feed the worms
Shoving the food scraps into the worm farm
Covering the food scraps with brown materials

Considering creating a song about the process
Managing compost layers with browns and greens
